languages.text: "Прискорбная весть... мои соболезнования. И, полагаю, вы и есть наследни{mf|к|ца} священного Торгового Патента и высокого титула {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Что ж... что именно привело вас в святилище {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Прискорбная весть... мои соболезнования. И, полагаю, вы и есть наследни{mf|к|ца} священного Торгового Патента и высокого титула {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Что ж... что именно привело вас в святилище {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}?"

languages.text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Прискорбная весть... мои соболезнования. И, полагаю, вы и есть наследни{mf|к|ца} священного Торгового Патента и высокого титула {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Что ж... что именно привело вас в святилище {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}?"

"The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"

"The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

languages.text: “真是个令人惋惜的消息……我对此表示哀悼。我猜想，神圣的贸易授状，以及{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}尊贵称号的继承人不是别人，正是你。既然如此……究竟是什么风，把你吹到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的圣所呢？”
languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: “真是个令人惋惜的消息……我对此表示哀悼。我猜想，神圣的贸易许可证，以及{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}尊贵称号的继承人不是别人，正是你。既然如此……究竟是什么风，把你吹到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的圣所呢？”

languages.text: 「嘆かわしい報せだ…では、神聖なる通商許可証と{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の気高き称号を受け継ぐのは御身であると見受けるが…それが{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}のサンクトゥムになぜ足を運ばれたのですか？」
languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: 「嘆かわしい報せだ…では、神聖なる取引令状と、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}の気高き称号を受け継ぐのはあなただと見受けるが…それが{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}オムニシア{/g}の聖域へと何の用だね？」

languages.text: "Das ist eine bedauerliche Nachricht ... Mein Beileid. Und den heiligen Handelsbrief sowie den stolzen Titel des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlers{/g} habt dann wohl Ihr geerbt, nehme ich an. Nun denn ... was genau führt Euch zum Sanctum des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine bedauerliche Nachricht ... Mein Beileid. Und den heiligen Handelsbrief sowie den stolzen Titel des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlers{/g} habt dann wohl Ihr geerbt, nehme ich an. Nun denn ... was genau führt Euch zum Sanctum des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

languages.text: « Une bien triste nouvelle... Toutes mes condoléances. Et je présume que vous êtes alors l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de la lettre de marque et du titre de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Eh bien, dans ce cas... qu'est-ce qui vous amène au sanctum de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}, exactement ? »
languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: « Une bien triste nouvelle... Toutes mes condoléances. Et je présume que vous êtes alors l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de la lettre de marque et du titre de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Eh bien, dans ce cas... qu'est-ce qui vous amène au sanctum de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}, exactement ? »

languages.text: «Es una noticia lamentable... Mis condolencias. Asumo que {mf|el heredero|la heredera} a la sagrada Patente de Comercio y al grandioso título de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} no es otr{mf|o|a} que usted mism{mf|o|a}. Dígame, pues: ¿qué le trae al sanctum del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: «Es una noticia lamentable... Mis condolencias. Asumo que {mf|el heredero|la heredera} a la sagrada Patente de Comercio y al grandioso título de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} no es otr{mf|o|a} que usted mism{mf|o|a}. Dígame, pues: ¿qué le trae al sanctum del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?».

languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of Rogue Trader is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the Omnissiah?"

languages.text: "Üzücü bir haber. Başınız sağ olsun. Sanırım kutsal Ticari Ruhsatname ile yüce {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ünvanı da vâris olarak siz devraldınız. Şimdi... Sizi {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} Kutağı'na getiren nedir?"
languages.original_text: "The news is lamentable... My condolences. And I presume the heir to the sacred Warrant of Trade and the lofty title of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is none other than yourself. Well then... what precisely has brought you to the Sanctum of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}?"
